name: Web App Development
description: Standard agile web application project template with common development phases

taskTemplates.name: Setup repository and CI/CD
taskTemplates.description: Initialize git repository, configure CI/CD pipeline, and set up development environment

taskTemplates.name: Design database schema
taskTemplates.description: Create ER diagrams, define tables, relationships, and indexes

taskTemplates.name: Implement authentication
taskTemplates.description: Set up user authentication, authorization, and session management

taskTemplates.name: Build core API endpoints
taskTemplates.description: Implement RESTful API endpoints for main business logic

taskTemplates.name: Create frontend components
taskTemplates.description: Build React components, pages, and routing

taskTemplates.name: Write unit tests
taskTemplates.description: Create unit tests for critical business logic and components

taskTemplates.name: Integration testing
taskTemplates.description: Test end-to-end workflows and API integrations

taskTemplates.name: Deploy to staging
taskTemplates.description: Deploy application to staging environment and perform smoke tests

phases.name: Planning & Setup
phases.description: Project initialization, requirements gathering, and environment setup

phases.name: Testing
phases.description: Unit, integration, and user acceptance testing

phases.name: Deployment
phases.description: Staging deployment, final testing, and production release
